nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper
nodes.text: Welcome to my shop! I have all sorts of supplies for adventurers. What can I do for you?

nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper
nodes.text: Take your time! Feel free to look around. I'll be here if you need anything.

nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper
nodes.text: Actually, yes! I could use some help with a few things. Interested?

nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper
nodes.text: I'm researching elemental monsters! If you could defeat some Flamepups and Bubblefins for me, I'd pay handsomely. 3 of each should do it.

nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper
nodes.text: Wonderful! Flamepups are found in warmer areas, and Bubblefins near water. Good luck!

nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper
nodes.text: I need monster bones to craft new items. If you could gather 5 Monster Bones from your adventures, I'd be grateful. This job is always available!

nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper
nodes.text: Thank you! Monster Bones drop from various creatures you defeat. Come back when you have enough!

nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper
nodes.text: Let me see what you've got... Ah yes! You've completed the task. Here's your reward!

nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper
nodes.text: Fascinating! These elemental specimens will help my research greatly. Here's something special for your trouble!

nodes.speaker: Shopkeeper
nodes.text: Perfect! These bones will make excellent crafting materials. Come back anytime you have more!

nodes.speaker: Healer
nodes.text: Hello there, young adventurer! You look like you've been through a tough battle. How can I help?

nodes.speaker: Healer
nodes.text: There you go! All patched up and ready for adventure. Stay safe out there!

nodes.speaker: Healer
nodes.text: Alright! Come back anytime you need healing. I'm always here to help.

nodes.speaker: Healer
nodes.text: Actually, I could use some help gathering ingredients for my remedies!

nodes.speaker: Healer
nodes.text: I need Soft Fur from forest creatures - it's a key ingredient in many healing potions. Could you collect 3 for me?

nodes.speaker: Healer
nodes.text: Thank you so much! Soft Fur drops from furry creatures like Mossbuns. Good luck out there!

nodes.speaker: Healer
nodes.text: Oh wonderful! Let me see what you've brought...

nodes.speaker: Healer
nodes.text: These are perfect! I can make so many remedies with this. You have the heart of a true helper! Here's your reward.

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Hey there! Welcome to Sunlit Village. What brings you by?

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Sure thing! What would you like to know?

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: When you encounter a monster, you can Attack, use Abilities that cost MP, use Items from your inventory, or try to Flee. Some abilities are super effective against certain elements!

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Walk into the tall grass outside the village center. Wild monsters appear as you explore! The further from the village, the tougher they get.

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Press ESC to open your menu. You can manage your inventory and equip weapons, armor, helmets, and accessories. Better equipment means stronger stats!

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Good luck out there, adventurer! Come back if you ever need more tips.

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Ah, looking for adventure? I've got several tasks that need doing!

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Here are more quests available:

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: The village has been having trouble with Mossbuns lately. They're not dangerous, but they've been eating our crops! Could you defeat 5 of them?

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Great! Mossbuns can be found just outside the village in the grass. Come back when you've defeated 5!

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Have you met our Monster Breeder? She's an expert on monster bonding and breeding. You should go talk to her!

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: She's right here in the village - look for her near the eastern side. She'll teach you all about monster friendship!

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: There are reports of interesting sights in the Whispering Woods to the north. Think you could explore it and report back?

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: The Whispering Woods is north of the village. Be careful - the monsters there are stronger than around here!

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: A powerful Forest Guardian has appeared in the Whispering Woods. It's been scaring travelers! Only a strong adventurer could defeat it.

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Brave adventurer! The Forest Guardian dwells deep in the Whispering Woods. Make sure you're well-prepared before facing it!

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Rumors speak of mysterious Crystal Caverns beyond the forest. Few have ventured there. Would you be brave enough to explore them?

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: The Crystal Caverns are said to be beyond the Whispering Woods. You'll need to defeat the Forest Guardian first to access the deeper regions!

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Back already? Let's see how you did!

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Well done, young tamer! You've proven yourself capable. The village is safer thanks to you! Here's your reward.

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Wonderful! Your courage to explore is admirable. The world needs more adventurers like you! Take this reward.

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: Incredible! You've defeated the Forest Guardian! Your strength is remarkable. You are truly worthy of the title Monster Tamer!

nodes.speaker: Village Guide
nodes.text: The Crystal Caverns! Few have ventured there and returned. Your bravery is truly inspiring! Here's a special reward.

nodes.speaker: Monster Breeder
nodes.text: Hello there! I'm the village's monster breeder. How can I help you today?

nodes.speaker: Monster Breeder
nodes.text: When two monsters breed, their baby can inherit traits from both parents. Monsters in the same breeding group are more compatible. You can also use special items like Breeding Charms and Trait Crystals to improve your chances!

nodes.speaker: Monster Breeder
nodes.text: Sometimes, if you're lucky, a baby monster will develop a rare mutation! These special traits are very powerful. Using a Mutation Catalyst item can increase your chances of getting one.

nodes.speaker: Monster Breeder
nodes.text: Come back anytime you want to breed your monsters. Good luck on your adventure!

nodes.speaker: Monster Breeder
nodes.text: I'm so glad you came to visit! Here's a breeding charm to help you on your journey. Come back when you're ready to breed monsters!
